reproduction:
-question Which part of the ovary in mammals acts as an endocrine gland after ovulation?
  -options --o Vitelline membrane --c Graffian follicle --o Stroma --o Germinal epithelium  
  -time 20
  
  -question In the human females, menstruation can be deferred by the administration of: 
  -options --o FSH ONLY --o LH ONLY --o COMBINATION OF FSH AND LH --c COMBINATION OF ESTROGEN AND PROGESTERONE 
  -time 20
  
  -question Which extraembryonic membrane in humans prevents desiccation of embryo inside the uterus
  -options --o Yolk sac --c Amnion --o Chorion --o Allantois
  -time 20
  
  -question Ectopic pregnancy are referred to as: 
  -options --o Pregnancies terminated due to hormonal imbalance --o Pregnancies with genetic abnormalities --c Implantation of embryo at site other than uterus --o Implantation of defective embryo in uterus
  -time 20
  
  -question Hysterectomy is surgical removal of:
  -options --o Prostate gland --o Vas-deferens --o Mammary gland --c Uterus 
  -time 20

  -question Capacitation occurs in:
-options --o Epididymis --o Vas deferens --c Female reproductive tract --o Rete testis
-time 20

-question The amnion of mammalian embryo is derived from: 
-options --c Ectoderm and mesoderm --o Endoderm and mesoderm --o Mesoderm and trophoblast --o Ectoderm and endoderm
-time 20

-question No new follicles develop in luteal phase of the menstrual cycle because 
-options --o Follicles do not remain in ovary after ovulation --o FSH level are high in luteal phase --o LH levels are high in the luteal phase --c Both FSH and LH are low in the luteal phase
-time 20

-question Which of the following statement is not correct:
-options --o Mammary lobes containing clusters called alveoli --o Uterus is also called womb --c The last part of oviduct is called ampulla --o Stroma of ovary is divided into two zones
-time 20

-question Which of the following hormone is essential for maintenance of the endometrium
-options --o FSH --o LH --c Progesterone --o Testosterone
-time 20

-question When both ovary are removed then which of the hormone is decreased in blood
-option --o Oxytocin --o Prolactin --c Estrogen --o Gonadotrophic releasing factor
-time 20

-question In 30 year old lady, eggs are released in form of:
-options --o oogonia --o 1° (primary) oocyte --c 2° (secondary) oocyte --o Atretic follicle
-time 20

-question After ovulation follicles converted into:
-options --c Corpus luteum --o Corpus albicans --o Corpus cavemosa --o Corpus callosum
-time 20/n
